price: 6. Kuwase (Xaqa) rumeeya oo samaha fala, waxay leeyihiin jar aan weligi go’ynin (Janno).
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti falahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
